snippet: Riot police officers on Wednesday clashed with protesters after the funeral of a student at the University of Khartoum.
abstract: Sudanese riot police officers fire tear gas on protesters after the funeral of Ali Abaker Musa Idris, University of Khartoum student who was shot to death when student activists from Darfur were demonstrating against an escalation of violence there.
lead_paragraph: Riot police officers on Wednesday clashed with protesters after the funeral of a student at the University of Khartoum.

headline.main: Sudan: Police Fire Tear Gas After Funeral in Khartoum

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
